Rotation.RotationList: [Misc] Initialization|[Misc] Pause Rotation|[Support] Automatic Buffing|[Misc] Instance: Combat Detection|[Support] Dispersion|[Support] Healthstone|[Support] Mass Dispel|[Support] Potion Usage|[Support] Desperate Prayer|[Support] Alchemy: Lifeblood|[Support] Power Infusion|[Support] Racials|Mind Spike (Movement)|Shadowfiend|Devouring Plague|Shadow Word: Death|Mind Blast|Mind Flay (Insanity)|Shadow Word: Pain|Vampiric Touch|Mind Spike|Shadow Word: Pain (Mouseover)|Vampiric Touch (Mouseover)|Level 90 Talent|Mind Flay
Rotation.RotationNotes:
Automatic Shadow Priest rotation based upon personal experience and SimulationCraft. 5.2 Ready!
Support: - Mouseover dotting of Vampiric Embrace + Shadow Word: Pain - Racial abilities - Automatic healthstone usage - And much more, fully customizable in-game through PQInterface 2!
Keybindings are now fully configurable in-game!
- Left Shift: Level 90 Talent - Left Alt: Mass Dispel @ Mouseover location - Right Alt: Dispersion - Right Control: Pause Rotation - Right Shift: Toggle cooldown mode
With optional Vampiric Touch, Void Shift on mouseover and Level 15 talent keybindings all ready!
